entry.title: how much longer 'till i'm taller?
entry.summary:
Author: artemissrx6

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,296Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 8

Summary: "I'm going to hug you now. Feel free to deck me. Just maybe not in the face." Before he can process, you pull him up and grab his shoulders to yank him towards you. Your arms circle around him, hands gently rubbing between his shoulder blades, and he hiccups a sob. He breaks down, and you hold him through it with the patience of a saint, because there's no way you're anything but some sort of divine gift brought to torment him with kindness and warmth. Once his tears stop falling, the shakes subsiding, you pull away just a little bit, to wipe his face with the sleeve of your hoodie. You smile at him, and something finally gives. He doesn't feel alone anymore. He always felt like sharing his sorrow would break the other person, letting them see the darkness brewing in his soul and tainting them with it, but you look the same as always. A bit tired, but still you. And his anguish feels less, feels like you scooped it up and took some with you, content to carry it with him.
